[ [Version Française](/releases/4_3_4_fr.php) ]
After a lengthy QA process, [PHP 4.3.4](/downloads.php) is finally out!
Bugfix release --------------
PHP 4.3.4 contains, among others, following important fixes, additions and improvements:
- Fixed disk_total_space() and disk_free_space() under FreeBSD. - Fixed FastCGI support on Win32. - Fixed FastCGI being unable to bind to a specific IP. - Fixed several bugs in mail() implementation on win32. - Fixed crashes in a number of functions. - Fixed compile failure on MacOSX 10.3 Panther. - Over 60 various bug fixes!
For a full list of changes in PHP 4.3.4, see the [ChangeLog](/ChangeLog-4.php#4.3.4).
